result.ga: Is féidir leat geall a chur air
result.orig: Is féidir leat geall a chur air
result.html: Is féidir leat geall a chur airYou can bet on it.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat geall a ċur airYou can bet on it.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ga: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.orig: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.html: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sé geall dom go dtiocfaiḋ sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: It is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ga: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.orig: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.html: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeiḋ moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.

result.eng: I bet it is. You bet it is.
result.html: Bíodh geall air go bhfuilI bet it is. You bet it is.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ geall air go ḃfuilI bet it is. You bet it is.
